note.p: Education: City of London School (1874-1881). ScD (Camb); MA

Career: Fellow of Peterhouse, Cambridge; Professor of Mathematics, University of Calcutta; Professor of Mathematics, University of Liverpool; Professor of Mathematics, University of Wales; President, Union Internationale de Mathematicians
Obituaries: Obituary Notices of Fellows of the Royal Society 1942-1944 vol 4 pp 307-323, plate, by G H Hardy
References: Patricia Rothman, 'Grace Chisholm Young and the Division of Laurels' in NR 1996 vol 50 pp 89-100, plate
R W Home, 'The Royal Society and the Empire: the colonial and Commonwealth Fellowship. Part 2. After 1847' in NR 2003 vol 57 pp 47-84
